abstract: On Saturday  gay-friendly lyrics to "Sunrise, Sunset," approved by Sheldon Harnick, the "Fiddler on the Roof" lyricist, were sung officially for the first time at the nuptials of Richard Skipper and Daniel Sherman.
snippet: On Saturday  gay-friendly lyrics to "Sunrise, Sunset," approved by Sheldon Harnick, the "Fiddler on the Roof" lyricist, were sung officially for the first time at the nuptials of Richard Skipper and Daniel Sherman.

headline.main: Miracle of Miracles: 'Sunrise, Sunset' Gets a Gay Makeover
